body.name: Monoprice Low Profile 7.5 lb. Capacity Speaker Wall Mount Brackets (Pair) Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 13 hrs 31 mins
features: Package Dimensions: 11.6 H x 7.4 L x 8.4 W (centimetres)
These brackets are designed to mount small satellite speakers with a single-bolt mounting system
body.description: Easily mount your satellite speakers on your wall with this Speaker Wall Mounting Bracket set from Monoprice. These brackets are designed to mount small satellite speakers with a single-bolt mounting system. Each bracket can support a speaker weighing up to about 7.5 lbs. (3.5 kg). Each bracket can be adjusted for tilt and swivel, so you can point each speaker to the proper angle for the optimum audio experience.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 1,822 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, great quality, great price
reviews.reviewText: Comes with all the necessary hardware. This is an awesome and affordable accessory that did exactly what I needed it to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for rear speakers
reviews.reviewText: I bought a used 5.1 Vizio sound bar that had two rear speakers but no mounting brackets. I bought these and they worked perfectly. They were easy to install and even came with the little screws that fit in the back of the speakers for mounting them to the bracket. The price, versatility and quality of these brackets make them a great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, gets the job done, not great for Yamaha
reviews.reviewText: These were pretty easy to install, only needed 2 screws into the wall.It is very easy to move around and has very good range of motion.I have Yamaha speakers and apparently they're a different size for mounting. I've bought two different speaker mounts (one for center speaker and this for rear) and I had to retrofit both. My Yamaha speakers mount with a 1/4 machine screw. The screw that this came with for mounting was slightly smaller, I'd get a #10 machine screw, although I didn't actually test it's size.Very good value, and didn't take much to retrofit. I just had to drill out the hole to 1/4 and buy a 1/2" machine screw that fit my speaker. But a little extra work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect mounts for the video V series or M series 5.1 systems
reviews.reviewText: First I will state I did not need to purchase any additional hardware when installing my satellite speakers for the Vizio M-series sound bar system. The reason why is because I was able to use the mount screws that came with the Vizio satellite speaker brackets right out the box. The screws were long enough to fit through the bracket hole of the speaker mount and attach to the satellite speaker and properly be tightened enough that the speaker will not move.All other hardware screws and screw brackets came with satellite speakers in box.I found the satellite speakers to be a great quality for what you’re paying for. Yes, they are all plastic but the bracket that you screw to the wall is metal and the tightening screw for the speakers itself or metal. Worked out just fine for me as my speakers could not be any more than 2 pounds each. I would say if your speakers are 5 pounds or more then maybe you will get sag.I loved the installation set up as I can’t read instructions due to the fact I am a blind individual. But right out the box and hand the speakers mounts were very self-explanatory. There’s a metal flat plate that’s screws off the back of the mount then you install to the wall and then slide the speaker mount on the plate simple as pie.I paid just under nine dollars for these mounts and they shipped to my door in less than two days. I would buy these 100 times over for the price. Just bite the bullet if you’re on the Vizio V series or M series sound bar 5.1 system. I cannot say much for the other ones.Oh yes, and One more thing before I forget and leave this review, if you are wondering about tilt up and down it is not a whole lot. I’d say about 15° or 20 tops, however that is more than enough that should be needed for satellite speakers being mounted at your level. I set mine almost 50 inches from the floor. With a little tilt and worked out perfectly. And for side to side was more than enough. I’d say about 180° from left and right. Or just under so that should not be a problem for you depending on how big your speakers you’re mounting to this far. Like I said before I’ll say it again I would buy these mounts 100 times over for the price. Nine dollars free shipping that’s a goodbye for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked but wrong size screws
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to go with my Vizio surround sound. The rear speaker screws that came with the mounts didn’t fit. I had to buy my own screws. But after that it worked like I wanted. For the price it is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and adjust
reviews.reviewText: These mounts are very easy to install. You locate and mount the base plate to the wall and the speaker mount to the speaker case. Then just slide the speaker mount on to the base plate and lock in place with set screw. Easy enough for single person installation. Both horizontal and vertical detents make for simple and precise speaker positioning and aiming. Mounts are plastic, but very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These worked perfectly for what I needed them for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: fast delivery. The mounting screw included did not fit my speaker, so I had to order separate. Other than that, easy install and works great!
Atrasou a entrega, mas em relação ao produto mto bom, recomendo

reviews.reviewTitle: Economical, versatile and easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for some brackets for my new surround speakers; there's aren't fancy by any means but they're sturdy and easily mountable. I had to use a 10/24 bolt with a nut to secure my speaker but, other than that, this was a good purchase. You can't go wrong with these.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buenos bonitos y baratos con estilo
reviews.reviewText: Muy buenos soportes, de buena construcción, no son de super primera calidad pero son bastante buenos para lo que pagas. Super facil de instalar solo bastan 2 taquetes y pijas (incluidas).Giran digamos 180 grados arriba abajo izquierda derecha para posicionar la bocina a tu gusto, estoy muy feliz con mi compra los utilize para kit speakers traseros de barra lg sl5r y quedaron perfecto. (OJO para los que han preguntado, si puedes colocarselos a las bocinas con orificio de tipo "llave" SI SE PUEDE) solo hay que ponerle un tornillo volteado y una tuerca de contra para aprisionarlo en el soporte.Animense estan excelentes !!!
Super facile à mettre assez solide
Very good quality. Holds my speakers well which doesn’t have threaded holes
